website_summaries.verdict: Movie theater-like quality coming from a well-built, easy-to-use projector with simple features and setup.
pros: We love how this projector is compatible with a wide range of professional and at-home mounting systems
Easy to connect to virtually any computer
Lamp should last a long time
cons: Better for gaming than it is for a cinematic experience

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K Projector
customer_reviews.text: Pure quality for money. I’ve had Optoma and Benq projectors before and was a little hesitant buying this Viewsonic for first time, but a 4K projector for a grand had to be seriously considered. It’s streets ahead of what I expected. The performance through my SkyQ box in UHD is simply stunning. It’s quieter than units I’ve used before and the colours are really beautiful. I also use via my Sony 4K player and again the movies are just stunning, I genuinely see the improvement over HD, which was something I was concerned about with a 4K projector. For the money, this is just an absolute bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Harry T H

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Having read some of the reviews on here saying it doesn't support 4k and it's noisy I have to wonder if we are using the same projector. My projector is very quiet I barely notice it and it supports all the 4k content I have thrown at it. I am currently using nvidia shield tv to run YouTube and Netflix and Amazon prime and it runs them all fabulously in 4k. The picture quality is stunning and I just purchased a 4k blu-ray player and that looks amazing. This is a great projector at a good price and I have absolutely no regrets with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: I.alexander

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: For the price the Viewsonic X10-4K looks to be a great projector. Contrast is not the best but I found with a few settings changes the image with 4k content looked really good and colours are great. Audio through the built in speaker is very good too. This Projector has a USB-C port. I can plugin my MacBook Pro (2017) and get a 4k image of my desktop with one cable (no dongle), and it charges the MacBook Pro too! Great picture, great sound, long life LED light source (in theory), portability and USB-C. Great at this price. Viewsonic customer service has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Janet Webb

customer_reviews.title: Viewsonic X10 reliability issues
customer_reviews.text: The picture after some tweaking was fairly good, but appears over saturated. Very good design but after 1 week/20 hours of use the projector started to over heat after being left on for half an hour. I returned the Viewsonic X10 and replaced it with a Optoma UHD51 projector which has a better picture, contrast, colour, sharper details and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: MR Gary Facey

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the ViewSonic X10-4K Projector to watch TV and movies on a larger scale. I love the modern design, it is definitely one of most aesthetically attractive home projectors available. It only takes me a matter of minutes to setup and thanks to the short throw and lightweight design I can easily use it around the house. Despite its compact size, I was extremely impressed with image quality; the 4K Ultra HD provides crisp detail, high brightness and vivid colours. Sound quality is also excellent with the premium Harman Kardon speakers. I also like how this projector connects to Wi-Fi so I can easily stream from my phone or use the inbuilt apps to watch my favourite shows.
customer_reviews.author: V. Martel

customer_reviews.title: So far, the PX747-4K Ultra HD 4K is the best projector I've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, quiet, powerful, great color and vivid picture. I have been buying projectors for many years now, and this one has made an excellent first impression. It seems to take more time to process commands, like switching input, but that makes it better because it doesn't give up like most projectors I've owned and drop back to the previous one (it holds with a temporary input screen), which when one is trying to queue an input is a frustration gone! I get the impression that the design is solid on this one. It also has a good throw proportion at a short distance for me too; I get 112" @ 12ft.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lloyd Write

customer_reviews.title: Better Picture but....
customer_reviews.text: definately a sharper picture but unable to resolve 4k running test paterns could not find a viewsonic test patern so used generic ones Otherwise runs quietly not sure why you would want a built in speaker but does have an audio out for your audio system but if using headphones can sometimes be a bit low (may be due to source) thought it was a bit overprices -( I preferred the Epson picfture but it did not have an audio out socket crazy)
customer_reviews.author: Mike. Sarre

customer_reviews.title: Very good projector
customer_reviews.text: A very good projector and a good price, it's not true 4K, since it does pixel splitting in order to increase the pixel count. A true 4K projector would cost a hell of a lot more. The picture is bright, sharp and clear, the colours are great. I wish I could have purchased one with lense shift, like the full HD Epson projector that this replaces, but that would have been out of my price range at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Firmware update.
customer_reviews.text: When you click on the Aptoid app you will see a a system app “X10-4K OTA run this and the firmware will get updated to the most recent version apparently according to the explanation online for this app it is to assist firmware update for units that are stuck on older versions!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too budget for 4k
customer_reviews.text: I hoped I would love this projector, unfortunately I don't. I found the image too bright and no matter how much I tried to adjust it, it always looked terrible. In bright scenes it was unwatchable. The fan noise is reasonable, however in silent mode there is an annoying whistle that I can clearly hear in quiet scenes. I didn't rate the 4k image either, it's not native as you'd expect at this price point but the pixel shift feature didn't seem to add any clarity. I would rather spend the same money on a high end HD, decided to return the unit.
customer_reviews.author: RFP

customer_reviews.title: excellent; couple of almost-issues
customer_reviews.text: Solid build quality and decent sound, although low-power output through 3.5mm jack to external sound system. I used the optical instead, and a converter back to analogue which was cheaper than a preamp. It's clever about sizing itself and keystone, but almost too clever if you're trying to get it to fit a screen accurately. No zoom, which means adjustments are a pain in the arse when it's mounted (mine is, overhead). But it's glorious.
customer_reviews.author: justcomingdear

customer_reviews.title: Superb value budget 4K Projector
customer_reviews.text: Having made the mistake of buying one of the OEM Chinese projectors and being very disappointed with it I took the plunge on the Viewsonic. Immediately I am blown away by the sharpness, contrast and sound quality. This is a really good machine with a small amount of fan noise and a real rated lumens level. Detail from my Amazon fire stick 4k is fabulous. Highly recommended purchase. You do need a decent amount of distance between your screen and the projector, so check out the throw tables before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with this item, it’s beautiful, work incredibly well and simple to set up. The picture quality is very good and works equally well in a dim room. The Netflix app can be difficult to use, due to the remote as it’s slightly slow and won’t respond to certain functions but other than that this is a beautiful projector that I’d highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O Connell

customer_reviews.title: 4k under £1k will always be a trade off, this one is an amazing trade if you ask me.
customer_reviews.text: Great point are how bright it is and the picture quality. Down side is HDR not too noticeable as you might expect on projector (impressed can see any difference) and switch resolutions take a bit of time. All in all for my use of gaming on white painted wall it’s a stunner and for the price five stars for sure!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Quarrell

customer_reviews.title: The cheapest value for money 4k projector
customer_reviews.text: I simply love it. Bought it a few days ago and i am addicted to its vid quality. Works great.. has some fan noise but my speakers and its video quality takes away the focus. If u want high res 4k HDR rec. 2020 projection with high ansi lumens, with decent sound at lesser cost, then its for you. If you have loads of money for ultra short throw and laser 4k projector, then you can skip it. If you also want it to be smart (android tv) then u gotta wait or else buy roku/fire stick etc. for it
customer_reviews.author: Anjan Deb

customer_reviews.title: superb quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well even after over a year, love the picture quality. My problem is that sometimes it doesn't recognize the source when the source is already turned on, works better if projector is already running and then the source is turned on afterwards. Also sometimes the fan is very noisy, but only for a short time after being turned and then it's fine, otherwise quiet. Eats a lot of energy, but in winter it also keeps the room warmer :) Generally though I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jjanos87

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! But is not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The Viewsonic X10-4K is really good! I've used it for 1 month now and the only bad thing is the control remote. It has a very cheap built quality and it is not very responsive. I think I will need to replace it with another control at some point. It does not have a 4K chip so its not true 4K but the quality you get with its technology is pretty amazing! I've played 4K content and it looks really good and sharp. In terms of brightness, during the day you may need to adjust the brightness to its maximum to get a decent view. As a conclusion, Im very happy with the purchase and I'll definitely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality, screen size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the picture quality in regards of price. The down side for me is that you cannot increase or decrease considerably the screen size, it really depends on the distance that you will set it up. I guess this is more of a need of mine. On my last projector I was able to increase and decrease the screen size to my liking, 60inch, 80inch, 100inch etc... Other than that I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Onisim Balc

customer_reviews.title: convenient and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low noise level, very good image quality, bright enough to project on white wall in a room open windows, very quick start up, really good speakers... Only thing that might be an issue for some (ok for me), you have to set it up at a fixed distance from the screen based on the size of the screen, and right in front of it because there is no horizontal adjustment. Also I haven't tried it for gaming yet, and I understand the lag time is quite high... we'll see about that... Apart from that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier P.

customer_reviews.title: Finally TV replacement
customer_reviews.text: Colours were bright and indistinguishable from a 4k TV in light controlled but double the size. With windows/curtains open then it's watchable, but not a cinema-like. Only one adjustable leg is irritating and meant I used a little book to even it out
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Emanuele Ciurleo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 4k for the price
customer_reviews.text: I now play Fortnite on my ps4 pro in 4k on a wall and i love my life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: £800 for a 4k 3500lumins projector well worth the money got it set up with a black 80" screen custom made and it looks fantastic. Works very good in day light unlike some others that wash out cant go wrong with this projector
customer_reviews.author: Michael kiggin

customer_reviews.title: Not true 4k but close
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase this in the understanding that its not true 4k but close and the contrast/colour range is not as good as a led tv then this is fantastic. If you try to compare it then you will be dissapointed as the colours are a little washed out compared to a led or plasma tv an in order to keep the cost below £3000 it is not true 4k and is a mimic of 4k
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly poor colour reproduction compared to my 720p projector
customer_reviews.text: Its not a hdr projector as advertised. Colours are washed out way too much. Blacks are nonexistent. It's a great product if you've got nothing to compare it to. I would recommend buying a good Full HD projector instead of this.
customer_reviews.author: gorav

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant bit of kit very nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Goes everywhere with me. I am on the road often and have tried portable projectors and been very disappointed this has replaced all of them and my home cinema unit. Only gripe is it's a bit loud and you do still get the odd bit of colour banding.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Markyp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Price ,Amazing Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This projector is superb it’s my first 4k projector and I use it daily . The picture quality is superb on my 120” screen totally delighted with it.

customer_reviews.title: Not short throw enough
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately wasn’t short throw enough, so wasn’t suitable for my lounge, had to return it, didn’t use it long enough to be able to give it a proper review.

customer_reviews.title: very good

customer_reviews.title: Brightness

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality

customer_reviews.title: Hight brightness 4K projector
customer_reviews.text: Use this projector in the living room. The picture quality is good even with a decent amount of ambient light. Best value for money!

customer_reviews.author: Jimmy McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. It’s not bad, it just doesn’t rival the competition. Get the Optoma UHD50 instead. Same DLP chip, better color, controls, and hardware. It’s also much, much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough to not need to close the shades
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Visually, great value for the money - Bright enough for daytime use without needing to close shades - 2 HDMI slots - USB port able to power a Chromecast Ultra - Useful backlit remote Cons - Audio options lacking (Bluetooth or optical out would be nice) - Loud fan - Gets really hot (can heat up a small room) - VGA? RS232 port? I would have preferred another HDMI port.
customer_reviews.author: Lifetime Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Viewsonic x10-4ke projector
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Advertised as android and aptoide based app store. But cannot install disney+, hotstar, prime video, hulu, HBO. Pathetic app store. Need to add additional roku device just to add streaming. Very bad. Not a single wire device. Need to attach external device. Otherwise picture quality is very good in very bright room. No need of white projector paint or screen. Just plain wall and enjoy. Speaker is not that good. But can work for non audiophile. Light weight and can move it easily. Setup is easy. But manual keystone is not that great as well auto does not help to make screen size go straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work before 2000 hours
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 years, less than 2000 hours, sent it back for warranty...took a month...sent it back with no info on what was done to "fix" it...60 seconds after turning it on...same issue it had a month earlier when I sent it away...only change was they removed the "warranty" seal sticker. Poor quality product and same service. Stay away at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, sound is mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: 110" 4k screen, yes please. Factory speaker started giving out about 3 weeks in. Have to get a 4k receiver if you plan to have good surround sound, as sound output is minimal. Although, the price point of this projector makes up the difference there. Does crank out some heat, but when ceiling mounted it's not so bad. Overall, I can't imagine not having a projector now, and this one is pretty sweet for the money.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: 1 4k input, no optical out, no manual
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and bright enough for daytime viewing. Only 3 problems. The sound is pretty good for what it is, but there is no bass to speak of. Granted it comes from smallish internal speakers, but my plasma tv had much deeper sound. Also disapointed that it has no optical audio output. And it came with no manual, just a quick-start booklet. My last complaint is my biggest. Only 1 of the hdmi ports is 4k. It's a 4k projector. Why have an input that can't handle 4k? You'll need a 4k hdmi switch if you have more than 1 4k device.
customer_reviews.author: JWK

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Not perfect but very good considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not perfect but very good considering the price. I would give it an B+ maybe and A if I would sit down and fine tune it. If you want an A+ projector, then thousands more $ would be necessary. I shoot a 105 inch screen from 12 feet away. Clean and easy to watch, again not perfect, but very good. Super bright, but I would rather lower it when not needed than to need it and not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector
customer_reviews.text: great quality. Terrific picture. brighter than my old one, even in Movie mode. I have not tried 4k. quiet enough. I was disappointing with the zoom. It has limited range therefore when I move the projector back from behind my head, I will need a bigger screen. Also disappointed that there is no vertical adjust.. not even jack screws. I use coasters. Wife hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the $ budget 4K projector
customer_reviews.text: I thought my Optoma was bright but this will work on broad daylight. For a budget 4K projector, this is well worth the money. A true 4K projector will cost 4 times the money and must be used in a dark room. This unit is good for casual use in bright environment and still produce a relatively decent picture. Good value for a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Stan1689

customer_reviews.title: Best 1100 dollar projector on market
customer_reviews.text: 1. Picture quality out of box was very good 2. No operation Manuel or calibration sheet Include in box . 3. HDMI cable was to short to achieve a 84 inch or greater picture . 4. Overall this prjector is the best value on the market. And is Easley a better value than buying an 75. Inch or larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd 4k SonicView projector.
customer_reviews.text: Dear Staff, This is my second projector. It has also a defect in it. After 1 week the projector would not take any commands from the remote. I spoke with 2 Amazon trouble shooters.They gave me a link to purchase a new remote. I received it and it worked but the projector did not. Finally I spoke with someone who sent me a return label. Thank you, Randel Harris
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the image (it is not wow, but okay), the short throw performance, the noise kills me
customer_reviews.text: I got this product from Woot. As I said in the title, I like the image (it is not wow, but okay), the short throw performance, the noise kills me. Unfortunately, it is on top of my head when watching. I recommend, if you can, to put it a little far from where you sit.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Gandra

customer_reviews.title: You have been warned
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money if you real intrested in real contrast...I took it then i return it back... Picture quality is just bright without good color and contrast..
customer_reviews.author: Adel S. Almohsen

customer_reviews.title: Great projector but not that easy to install perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Brightness is awesome, even with lights on in the room, picture color is great and clear! - The picture quality is great compared to the large TV we have - The price is great! Cons: The only problem with this projector is you have to perfectly install it center to your screen. Some of the other projector support auto adjust the angle of the lens. If this come with the auto adjust feature it would be a perfect project.
customer_reviews.author: shrimpy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this unit for over one year and it works great. I love it. I was having an over heating problem where it would overheat and turn off. So I looked at the cooling fan and it was covered in dust build up. Took off the cover and cleaned the dust off and out if the unit it was a lot of dust. No more overheating. Ha, I still need to get a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great projector after THX setup !
customer_reviews.text: i used the THX app from my phone and wow what a difference !! it looks great on an apple tv 4k 422 HDR enable, my settings are brightness 40 contrast 80 color 47 tint 43 sharpness 6 gamma 2.8 color enhancement 10 skin tone 3 super resolution 3 hope it helps!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Y. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great for movies. Gaming input lag a little too much
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ViewSonic PX747-4k as a way to have a TV wherever I wanted at whatever size. Picture quality is important to me and this projector achieved that, and it is a cool experience to someone who's never owned one before. It's easily usable in light, and obviously looks way better in the dark. On the other hand I game a lot on an Xbox One X and the noticable input lag is too much for fps games where reaction time matters. I'm either gaming or on Netflix, and the delay is too much for me personally and for that reason I may return it and go with a 1080p projector with low latency.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar Husain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stunning display
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought this projector to replace another with a lower resolution. The 4K is beautiful and such a big improvement over my old projector!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have it set up on our patio with a 120 inch pull down screen and it is perfect for movies at night, You can't really use it during the day, especially around mid to late afternoon, but it's a great projector for evening especially during COVID times!
customer_reviews.author: Soo Yeon Kang

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Cinema Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. The image is crisp, sharp and bright. The only draw back is that the projector puts out a border around the image. When I called Viewsonic, they said that's just the way it is. I had to create a small frame for the lens to crop the over projection which worked fine. Don't get me wrong, this is a great projector and one small adaptation made it just about perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the buy ! had a very good experience with my 1st view sonic PG (PX700HD) so decided to go again with the same manufacture this time 4K with affordable price . this PG has CEC option but couldn't turned it on/off using my Nvidia shield - so i must use the original remote control . Pros: 4K,good price, great picture quality (clear color even in dynamic mode) Cons: slight noisy (got used to it) , there is option to activate silent mode but it cancel the 4K per my understanding
customer_reviews.author: Shimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4K Viewing Experience
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the PX747-4K and couldn't be happier. 1) My family uses the Amazon Fire TV Stick and pairing that with the PX747-4K has amplified our home entertainment experience. Long feature films are way more enjoyable and have a movie theater feel. 2) Obviously, many factors like room size and shape, height of ceilings, and color scheme, will impact your projector purchasing experience. I found that the 3500 lumens on this projector worked well for my living room. The colors are bright and vivid and the images are clear even during the day.
customer_reviews.author: currymung

customer_reviews.title: Buyer’s remorse
customer_reviews.text: Mine died after 2 months. It’s being repaired by the manufacturer. This is quite concerning. It makes wonder how soon it will be before I have to replace it all together. I had no problems up to the point when it powered off itself and wouldn’t come back on.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Durden

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best budget 4k HDR projector on the market right now
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd projector and I considered it a upgrade from 1080 P to 4K HDR I really was surprised at how good this projector performed you can see all the extra details in the picture clarity. It produces a image so good it feels more like you're watching a 125" 4k tv and not a projected image like a traditional projector and I noticed how much brightness it produces over my vankyo 510 projector. I mainly use mine for backyard home theater with a inflatable 16 ft screen and its a blast to view movie on
customer_reviews.author: Andre Durr

customer_reviews.title: Incredible movie quality
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service from ViewSonic. The projector is GREAT! They released a later version with a later firmware containing some improved tweaks. We contacted them & they swapped ours out with no issues or questions. We REALLY like this projector. Great movie & TV watching. You won’t be disappinted
customer_reviews.author: Karen Houser

customer_reviews.title: Resolution and picture size makes for sub par experience
customer_reviews.text: At this price point the picture resolution and quality should be better. It’s zoom in is great but to get a reasonable picture size the picture quality loss makes the experience like that of my flatscreen at a lower resolution. It’s just not really 4K. Rapid action lacks clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: and I really love this 4K projector
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the PX727-4K to replace an aging 1080P model, and I really love this 4K projector. The improvement in image definition was instantly recognizable, even when viewing lower resolution content ... No more pixelated movie nights for me! The colors and black levels were all amazing, right out of the box, and didn’t require settings changes or complicated calibration either. I project onto a 100” high gain screen, and the optical zoom function of the PX727-4K allowed me to utilize the existing ceiling mount without relocation. I haven’t found any negatives so far, but will keep you updated if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat, huge upgrade from what I had! I hear a lot of knocks on this projector but for $900 this projector does not disappoint. If you dont believe me buy it, try it and return it if you are not happy...
customer_reviews.author: Jonny & Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great picture in full dark rooms (no bluetooth)
customer_reviews.text: I’m throwing out my tv to use this full time. However it doesn’t work as good when it’s bright as they make it out to seem. Also how can modern devices like this not have Bluetooth for speakers ?

customer_reviews.title: Not a 4K projector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an optoma hd20.. And I am very disappointed since this projector isn’t 4K.. The optoma has a better picture than this one ...very sad that this people are selling this as a 4K when it isn’t 4 k 😥
customer_reviews.author: Andtos

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart 4K Projector
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this during the holidays and it’s been great so far. Videos are sharp and smooth when using Netflix. My DirecTV box is not 4K but the screen looks like it is. I’m just projecting it on a bare wall currently and it already looks good. Can’t wait to receive the 120” projector screen I ordered and I bet it will be awesome! The built-in Harman-Kardon audio is very clear and will be enough for most of the shows and movies I watch. Since it is portable, I can bring it to my buddy’s house on SuperBowl Sunday.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using a 10 year old view sonic projector which actually worked and looked great. I purchased this one and it was above and beyond what I was expecting. Im using a cheap screen off Amazon with this unit and it is amazing. Clarity is perfect. Works awesome on my PS4 as well. My screen size is about 12 ft wide and it looks like I'm at my local theatre. You will not be disappointed.
